snippet: A hospital technician accused of causing a multistate outbreak of hepatitis C will plead guilty in exchange for a prison term of 30 to 40 years.
abstract: David Kwiatkowski, hospital technician accused of causing a multistate outbreak of hepatitis C, is set to plead guilty in exchange for a prison term of 30 to 40 years.
lead_paragraph: A hospital technician accused of causing a multistate outbreak of hepatitis C will plead guilty in exchange for a prison term of 30 to 40 years.

headline.main: New Hampshire: Deal Reached in Hepatitis Case
headline.print_headline: New Hampshire: Deal Reached In Hepatitis Case
